analyzed: bya ba ci yang med 'gyur zhing //
translated: Then all this would be meaningless.🔽And if you refute emptiness,

original: bya ba rtsom pa'ang med par 'gyur //🔽bya ba dang byed pa med na /
analyzed: bya ba rtsom pa'ang med par 'gyur // bya ba dang byed pa med na /
translated: Then all this would be meaningless.

original: stong pa nyid la gnod byed na //
analyzed: stong pa nyid la gnod byed na //
translated: And if you refute emptiness,

original: mi byed pa yang byed par 'gyur //
analyzed: mi byed pa yang byed par 'gyur //
translated: Then all this would be meaningless.

original: gzhan yang / dngos nyid yod na 'gro ba rnams //
analyzed: gzhan yang / dngos nyid yod na 'gro ba rnams //
translated: If things had intrinsic reality,

original: gnas skabs sna tshogs bral 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: gnas skabs sna tshogs bral 'gyur zhing //
translated: beings would be devoid of various states.

original: ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags dang // ther zug tu yang gnas par 'gyur //
analyzed: ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags dang // ther zug tu yang gnas par 'gyur //
translated: They would be unarisen and unceased, and would endure eternally.

original: kha dog dang dbyibs dang / rigs dang / bong tshod la sogs pa'i skabs sna tshogs dang bral zhing /
analyzed: kha dog dang dbyibs dang / rigs dang / bong tshod la sogs pa'i skabs sna tshogs dang bral zhing /
translated: They would be devoid of the various states of color, shape, type, size, and so on.

original: rtsig pa la bris pa'i ri mo bzhin du 'gyur te /
analyzed: rtsig pa la bris pa'i ri mo bzhin du 'gyur te /
translated: They would be like a painting on a wall.

original: byas pa ma yin pa la 'jig pa med pa'i phyir ro /
analyzed: byas pa ma yin pa la 'jig pa med pa'i phyir ro /
translated: Because that which is not created would not disintegrate.

original: gal te stong pa yod min na //
analyzed: gal te stong pa yod min na //
translated: If emptiness did not exist,🔽There would be no obtaining of what has not been obtained,

original: ma thob thob par bya ba dang // sdug bsngal mthar byed las dang ni //
analyzed: ma thob thob par bya ba dang // sdug bsngal mthar byed las dang ni //
translated: No activity for ending suffering,

original: nyon mongs thams cad spong bar byed //
analyzed: nyon mongs thams cad spong bar byed //
translated: And no relinquishing of all afflictions.

original: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i thob par bya ba'i khyad par dang / sdug bsngal mthar 'byin par byed pa'i las dang / de'i gnyen po dag byar med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i thob par bya ba'i khyad par dang / sdug bsngal mthar 'byin par byed pa'i las dang / de'i gnyen po dag byar med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there would be no distinction between what is to be obtained by mundane beings and what is to be obtained by supramundane beings, no activity for ending suffering, and no antidotes to the afflictions.

original: de ltar ni mi 'dod pas de'i phyir ma dad bzhin du yang rten @234a * //
analyzed: de ltar ni mi 'dod pas de'i phyir ma dad bzhin du yang rten @234a * //
translated: But since that is unacceptable, therefore, even though you do not believe it, you must accept it.🔽

original: cing 'brel par 'byung ba ngo bo nyid las skye ba med pa sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu lta bu'i bdag nyid du skye ba khas blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: cing 'brel par 'byung ba ngo bo nyid las skye ba med pa sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu lta bu'i bdag nyid du skye ba khas blang bar bya'o //
translated: Since this is not accepted, therefore, even though one has no faith, one should accept dependent origination as arising from that which lacks intrinsic reality, like an illusion or a mirage.

original: de'i phyir de ltar dngos po dang dngos po med par lta ba la sogs pa'i skyon gyi rab rib dang bral ba'i blo gros kyi mig can /
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar dngos po dang dngos po med par lta ba la sogs pa'i skyon gyi rab rib dang bral ba'i blo gros kyi mig can /
translated: Thus, those who have eyes of intelligence free from the cataracts of faults such as the views of things and nonthings

original: gang gis rten cing 'brel par 'byung //
analyzed: gang gis rten cing 'brel par 'byung //
translated: see dependent origination.🔽Those who see dependent origination🔽see suffering, its origin, its cessation,

original: mthong ba des ni sdug bsngal dang // kun 'byung dang ni 'gog pa dang // lam nyid de dag mthong ba yin //
analyzed: mthong ba des ni sdug bsngal dang // kun 'byung dang ni 'gog pa dang // lam nyid de dag mthong ba yin //
translated: and the path.

original: tha snyad dang don dam pa'i bden pa'i tshul la ltos pas mthong ba dang / mthong ba med pa'i tshul gyis rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ji skad bstan pa'i mtshan nyid mthong ba des bden pa bzhi po de dag nyid skye ba dang / skye ba med pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa lngar ji skad bstan pa dag gis mthong ba yin no //
analyzed: tha snyad dang don dam pa'i bden pa'i tshul la ltos pas mthong ba dang / mthong ba med pa'i tshul gyis rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ji skad bstan pa'i mtshan nyid mthong ba des bden pa bzhi po de dag nyid skye ba dang / skye ba med pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa lngar ji skad bstan pa dag gis mthong ba yin no //
translated: Seeing the four truths in five aspects such as impermanence is seeing the four truths in terms of conventional and ultimate reality, and seeing dependent origination in terms of seeing and nonseeing.

original: gal te sdug bsngal ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa dag ma gtogs par /
analyzed: gal te sdug bsngal ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa dag ma gtogs par /
translated: If seeing the four truths is not seeing them in terms of aspects such as suffering,

original: gzhan du mthong ba ni bden pa mthong ba ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan du mthong ba ni bden pa mthong ba ma yin no zhe na /
translated: then seeing them in other ways is not seeing the truths.

original: bden pa mthong ba zhes bya ba'i sgra de'i don gang yin /
analyzed: bden pa mthong ba zhes bya ba'i sgra de'i don gang yin /
translated: What is the meaning of the term seeing the truths?

original: gal te nang gi skye mched rnams phyin ci ma log pa de kho na dang bcas pa nyid mthong ba'o zhe na ji skad bstan pa'i tshul gyis skye ba bkag pa'i phyir sdug bsngal skye ba med pa la sogs par mthong ba ni 'phags pa'i bden pa yin🔽par grub pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gal te nang gi skye mched rnams phyin ci ma log pa de kho na dang bcas pa nyid mthong ba'o zhe na ji skad bstan pa'i tshul gyis skye ba bkag pa'i phyir sdug bsngal skye ba med pa la sogs par mthong ba ni 'phags pa'i bden pa yin par grub pa'i phyir /
translated: If you say that the internal sense bases are seen as unmistaken and as they really are, then because arising is refuted in the manner explained above, the noble truths are established as the seeing of the nonarising of suffering and so on.

original: 'dod pa'i don nyams so //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i don nyams so //
translated: Therefore your intended point is undermined.

original: 'di na sdug bsngal la sogs pa ji ltar mthong na bden pa mthong ba yin zhes dpyad par bya ba yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di na sdug bsngal la sogs pa ji ltar mthong na bden pa mthong ba yin zhes dpyad par bya ba yin gyi /
translated: Here one should analyze how suffering and so on are seen, for the seeing of the truths is seeing suffering and so on.

original: ma'i l'a tu'i tshul gyis byung rgyal du brjod do cog gzung bar bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: ma'i l'a tu'i tshul gyis byung rgyal du brjod do cog gzung bar bya ba ma yin no //
translated: But it is not the case that everything that is said should be accepted as it comes, in the manner of a parrot.

original: de la 'dir rab tu byed pa'i don ni pha rol pos stong pa nyid smra ba la skyon gdags pa /
analyzed: de la 'dir rab tu byed pa'i don ni pha rol pos stong pa nyid smra ba la skyon gdags pa /
translated: Here the point of this chapter is to refute the opponent’s imputation of faults to the proponent of emptiness.

original: smras pa dag phyir bzlog pa'i sgo nas rab tu byed pa'i dang por smras pa'i gtan tshigs mi mthun pa'i phyogs 'ba' zhig la yod par bstan pas 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ngo bo nyid med pa nyid du bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: smras pa dag phyir bzlog pa'i sgo nas rab tu byed pa'i dang por smras pa'i gtan tshigs mi mthun pa'i phyogs 'ba' zhig la yod par bstan pas 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ngo bo nyid med pa nyid du bstan pa yin no //
translated: It was said in the first chapter that the reason is only present in the discordant side, by the method of reversal, and so the noble truths are shown to be realityless.

original: de'i phyir tshangs pa rnam grangs des kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir tshangs pa rnam grangs des kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste /
translated: Therefore, Brahma, by this method you should know that

original: ji ltar sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung dang / 'gog pa dang / lam ni 'phags pa rnams kyi bden pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: ji ltar sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung dang / 'gog pa dang / lam ni 'phags pa rnams kyi bden pa ma yin gyi /
translated: the truths of suffering, origin, cessation, and path are not the truths of the noble ones.

original: tshangs pa 'di ltar sdug bsngal gyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de 'phags pa rnams kyi bden pa yin pa dang / kun 'byung gi kun 'byung ba med pa gang yin pa de @234b 'phags pa rnams kyi bden pa yin pa dang / chos thams cad gtan du bkag pa dag la gtan 'gog pa gang yin pa de 'phags pa rnams kyi bden pa yin pa dang /
analyzed: tshangs pa 'di ltar sdug bsngal gyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de 'phags pa rnams kyi bden pa yin pa dang / kun 'byung gi kun 'byung ba med pa gang yin pa de @234b 'phags pa rnams kyi bden pa yin pa dang / chos thams cad gtan du bkag pa dag la gtan 'gog pa gang yin pa de 'phags pa rnams kyi bden pa yin pa dang /
translated: Brahma, it should be understood that the non-arising of suffering is the truth of the noble ones, the non-arising of the origin of suffering is the truth of the noble ones, the cessation of all phenomena is the truth of the noble ones,🔽and the cultivation of the path as non-dual with respect to the equality of all phenomena is the truth of the noble ones.

original: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid dag la gnyis su med pa nyid du lam sgom pa gang yin pa de 'phags pa rnams kyi bden pa yin par shes par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa de dag grub pa yin no //
analyzed: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid dag la gnyis su med pa nyid du lam sgom pa gang yin pa de 'phags pa rnams kyi bden pa yin par shes par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa de dag grub pa yin no //
translated: This is established.

original: slob dpon legs ldan byed kyis nye bar sbyar ba /
analyzed: slob dpon legs ldan byed kyis nye bar sbyar ba /
translated: This was composed by the master Bhāviveka.

original: dbu ma'i rtsa ba'i 'grel pa shes rab sgron ma las /
analyzed: dbu ma'i rtsa ba'i 'grel pa shes rab sgron ma las /
translated: In the Lamp of Wisdom, a commentary on the Root Verses of the Middle Way,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa brtag pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa brtag pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: This is called the Examination of the Noble Truths.

original: rab tu byed pa nyi shu bzhi pa'o /
analyzed: rab tu byed pa nyi shu bzhi pa'o /
translated: This is the twenty-fourth chapter.

original: // / da ni de bzhin du stong pa nyid kyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi khyad par dgag pas mya ngan las 'das pa ngo bo nyid med pa nyid du bstan pa'i don gyi dbang gis rab tu byed pa nyi shu lnga pa brtsam mo //
analyzed: // / da ni de bzhin du stong pa nyid kyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi khyad par dgag pas mya ngan las 'das pa ngo bo nyid med pa nyid du bstan pa'i don gyi dbang gis rab tu byed pa nyi shu lnga pa brtsam mo //
translated: Now, in order to demonstrate the realitylessness of nirvana by refuting the special varieties of the counter-positions of emptiness, the twenty-fifth chapter is begun, by the power of the subject matter.

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /
translated: Here, someone might say this:

original: khyod 'dod pa ltar /
analyzed: khyod 'dod pa ltar /
translated: According to your assertion,

original: gal te 'di dag kun stong na //
analyzed: gal te 'di dag kun stong na //
translated: if all these are empty,

original: 'byung ba med cing 'jig pa med //
analyzed: 'byung ba med cing 'jig pa med //
translated: there is neither origination nor cessation.

original: ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir dper na mo gsham gyi bu bzhin no zhes bya bar bsams so //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir dper na mo gsham gyi bu bzhin no zhes bya bar bsams so //
translated: Because of realitylessness, as in the case of the son of a barren woman.

original: de dag med pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa rnams la yang 'byung ba dang 'jig pa med la /
analyzed: de dag med pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa rnams la yang 'byung ba dang 'jig pa med la /
translated: Because of their non-existence, the defilements also have neither origination nor cessation.

original: de dag dang ldan pa'i ming dang / gzugs la yang 'byung ba dang 'jig pa med pas /🔽gang zhig spangs dang 'gags pa las //
analyzed: de dag dang ldan pa'i ming dang / gzugs la yang 'byung ba dang 'jig pa med pas / gang zhig spangs dang 'gags pa las //
translated: And because of their non-existence, name-and-form which possesses them also has neither origination nor cessation.🔽Therefore,🔽what is it that you imagine to be nirvana,

original: mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur bar 'dod //
analyzed: mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur bar 'dod //
translated: as that which is abandoned and ceases?

original: phung po lhag ma dang bcas pa dang / phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings kyi dbang gis so //🔽gang zhig spang bas sam /
analyzed: phung po lhag ma dang bcas pa dang / phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings kyi dbang gis so // gang zhig spang bas sam /
translated: It is due to the power of the realm of nirvana with and without the remainder of the aggregates.

original: 'gag pas mya ngan las 'da' bar yang 'dod de /
analyzed: 'gag pas mya ngan las 'da' bar yang 'dod de /
translated: And it is also asserted that nirvana is attained through abandonment or cessation.

original: ji skad du /🔽dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sred pa de zad cing /
analyzed: ji skad du / dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sred pa de zad cing /
translated: As it is said:

original: bral ba gang yin pa de ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o zhes kyang gsungs la /
analyzed: bral ba gang yin pa de ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o zhes kyang gsungs la /
translated: The extinction and separation of craving associated with the delight of attachment is nirvana.

original: de bzhin du /
analyzed: de bzhin du /
translated: And similarly:

original: ma zhum pa yi lus kyis ni //
analyzed: ma zhum pa yi lus kyis ni //
translated: With a body that is not faint,

original: tshor ba dang du len pa na //
analyzed: tshor ba dang du len pa na //
translated: accepting feeling,

original: de yi sems ni rnam par grol //
analyzed: de yi sems ni rnam par grol //
translated: his mind is liberated,

original: mar me shi bar gyur pa bzhin //🔽zhes kyang gsungs so //
analyzed: mar me shi bar gyur pa bzhin // zhes kyang gsungs so //
translated: like a flame that is extinguished.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa de yang ngo bo nyid yod pa 'di ma gtogs par gzhan gyis mi 'thob pas de'i phyir dngos po rnams ngo bo nyid yod pa nyid du 'dod par bya'o //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa de yang ngo bo nyid yod pa 'di ma gtogs par gzhan gyis mi 'thob pas de'i phyir dngos po rnams ngo bo nyid yod pa nyid du 'dod par bya'o //
translated: And the attainment of nirvana is not attained by any other means than this existence of reality. Therefore, one should assert that things exist inherently.

original: ngo bo nyid med pa nyid du smra ba rnams la ni gang ngo bo nyid med pa de la mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob pa med de /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid med pa nyid du smra ba rnams la ni gang ngo bo nyid med pa de la mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob pa med de /
translated: For those who advocate essencelessness, that which is essenceless cannot attain nirvana,

original: @235a * // 'byung ba dang 'jig pa med pa'i phyir dper na mo gsham gyi bu bzhin /
analyzed: @235a * // 'byung ba dang 'jig pa med pa'i phyir dper na mo gsham gyi bu bzhin /
translated: because it does not arise and does not cease, like the son of a barren woman.

original: ngo bo nyid med pa nyid du rjes su dpog pas mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob pa med pas mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob pa bsal ba'i phyir dam bcas pa la chos can gyi khyad par bsal ba'i skyon yod do //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid med pa nyid du rjes su dpog pas mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob pa med pas mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob pa bsal ba'i phyir dam bcas pa la chos can gyi khyad par bsal ba'i skyon yod do //
translated: Since nirvana is inferred to be essenceless, it cannot be attained. Therefore, the thesis has the fault of the elimination of the distinction of the subject.

original: de ni bzang po ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni bzang po ma yin te /
translated: This is not good.

original: ji ltar sgyu ma'i mar me ngo bo nyid dang bral ba 'chi ba tha snyad du gtogs pa'i blo'i spyod yul du yod par mi 'gal ba de bzhin du 'du byed rnams ngo bo nyid med pa yin yang thog ma med pa'i rkyen brgyud pa las skyes pa
analyzed: ji ltar sgyu ma'i mar me ngo bo nyid dang bral ba 'chi ba tha snyad du gtogs pa'i blo'i spyod yul du yod par mi 'gal ba de bzhin du 'du byed rnams ngo bo nyid med pa yin yang thog ma med pa'i rkyen brgyud pa las skyes pa
translated: Just as the essenceless illusory lamp is not inconsistent with existing as the domain of the mind that is conventionally included in death, so, even though compounded phenomena are essenceless, they arise from beginningless chains of conditions.

original: sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu lta bu dag gi skye ba med pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa yin no //
analyzed: sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu lta bu dag gi skye ba med pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa yin no //
translated: The non-arising of things that are like illusions and mirages is nirvana.

original: de'i 'thob pa yang 'grub pa'i phyir ngo bo nyid yod pa nyid rigs pa dang ni ldan par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i 'thob pa yang 'grub pa'i phyir ngo bo nyid yod pa nyid rigs pa dang ni ldan par shes par bya'o //
translated: And since its attainment is also established, the intrinsic reality of things should be understood to be tenable.

original: dngos po rnams med pa'i ngo bo nyid du khas ma blangs pa'i phyir dam bcas pa la skyon med do //
analyzed: dngos po rnams med pa'i ngo bo nyid du khas ma blangs pa'i phyir dam bcas pa la skyon med do //
translated: There is no fault in our thesis, because we do not accept that things are essentially nonexistent.

original: glags yod pa'i skyon yang med de /
analyzed: glags yod pa'i skyon yang med de /
translated: Nor is there the fault of incoherence,

original: mo gsham gyi bu la sogs pa dag don dam par dpe nyid du ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mo gsham gyi bu la sogs pa dag don dam par dpe nyid du ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the son of a barren woman and so on are not established as examples in an ultimate sense.

original: gzhan yang ji ltar dngos po rnams ngo bo nyid med pa nyid du rtogs pa la /
analyzed: gzhan yang ji ltar dngos po rnams ngo bo nyid med pa nyid du rtogs pa la /
translated: Moreover, how is it that things are understood to be essenceless?

original: gal te 'di dag kun stong na //
analyzed: gal te 'di dag kun stong na //
translated: If all this is empty

original: 'byung ba med cing 'jig pa med //🔽gang zhig spang dang 'gag pa las //
analyzed: 'byung ba med cing 'jig pa med // gang zhig spang dang 'gag pa las //
translated: There would be no arising and no disintegration.🔽And nirvana would be a non-thing

original: mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur bar 'dod //
analyzed: mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur bar 'dod //
translated: And one would be liberated without effort.

original: ces bya ba de bzhin du dngos po rnams ngo bo nyid du rtogs pa la yang /
analyzed: ces bya ba de bzhin du dngos po rnams ngo bo nyid du rtogs pa la yang /
translated: And similarly, how is it that things are understood to be essentially existent?

original: gal te 'di kun mi stong na //
analyzed: gal te 'di kun mi stong na //
translated: If all these were not empty,

original: 'byung ba med cing 'jig pa med //
analyzed: 'byung ba med cing 'jig pa med //
translated: there would be neither origination nor cessation.

original: gang zhig spang dang 'gag pa las //
analyzed: gang zhig spang dang 'gag pa las //
translated: And from the cessation of what

original: mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur bar 'dod //
analyzed: mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur bar 'dod //
translated: would nirvana be conceived?

original: ngo bo nyid la 'gyur ba med pas spang ba dang / 'gag pa mi 'thad pa'i phyir de kho na rab tu ma mthong ba nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la de kho na mthong ba mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid la 'gyur ba med pas spang ba dang / 'gag pa mi 'thad pa'i phyir de kho na rab tu ma mthong ba nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la de kho na mthong ba mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: Since there is no tenable cessation or abandonment in intrinsic reality, because intrinsic reality is changeless, therefore, it is not tenable that nirvana is seen in intrinsic reality itself, since reality is not seen.

original: de'i phyir ngo bo nyid yod par smra ba dag nyid la mya ngan las 'das pa'i thob pa yod pa bstan dka'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir ngo bo nyid yod par smra ba dag nyid la mya ngan las 'das pa'i thob pa yod pa bstan dka'o //
translated: Therefore, it is difficult to demonstrate that those who advocate intrinsic reality have attainment of nirvana.

original: ngo bo nyid med pa nyid la ni sgyu ma'i mar me 'chi ba bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa yod par rung ngo //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid med pa nyid la ni sgyu ma'i mar me 'chi ba bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa yod par rung ngo //
translated: But in the absence of intrinsic reality, it is tenable that nirvana is attained, just like the extinction of an illusory lamp.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob par rjes su dpog pas ngo bo nyid med pa nyid kyis ngo bo nyid yod pa nyid bsal ba'i phyir dam bcas pa la chos kyi ngo bo nyid bsal ba'i skyon yod do //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob par rjes su dpog pas ngo bo nyid med pa nyid kyis ngo bo nyid yod pa nyid bsal ba'i phyir dam bcas pa la chos kyi ngo bo nyid bsal ba'i skyon yod do //
translated: Since nirvana is inferred, and since the existence of an intrinsic reality is refuted by the absence of intrinsic reality, the thesis is not open to the fault of refuting the intrinsic reality of things.

original: yang na pha rol dag na re /
analyzed: yang na pha rol dag na re /
translated: Or, the opponent might say,

original: gal te 'di dag kun stong na //
analyzed: gal te 'di dag kun stong na //
translated: If all this is empty,

original: 'byung ba med cing 'jig pa med //
analyzed: 'byung ba med cing 'jig pa med //
translated: There is neither origination nor cessation,

original: de'i phyir / gang zhig spong dang 'gag @235b pa las //
analyzed: de'i phyir / gang zhig spong dang 'gag @235b pa las //
translated: And it follows that

original: mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur bar 'dod //
analyzed: mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur bar 'dod //
translated: Your thesis is not established And you have no position.

original: gal te 'du byed 'di dag mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod na ni /
analyzed: gal te 'du byed 'di dag mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod na ni /
translated: If you maintain that these compounded phenomena are nirvana,

original: 'du byed de dag don dam par ngo bo nyid yod pa kho nar shes par bya ste /
analyzed: 'du byed de dag don dam par ngo bo nyid yod pa kho nar shes par bya ste /
translated: then you should understand that these compounded phenomena definitely exist by way of intrinsic reality ultimately,

original: nyon mongs pa spang ba dang / ming dang gzugs 'gags pas mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa spang ba dang / ming dang gzugs 'gags pas mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because nirvana is attained through the cessation of name-and-form and the abandonment of the afflictions.

original: rnga mo la sogs pa'i rva yod pa ma yin pa dag la ni de dag med do zhes zer ro //
analyzed: rnga mo la sogs pa'i rva yod pa ma yin pa dag la ni de dag med do zhes zer ro //
translated: The horns of a rabbit and so on do not exist.

original: slob dpon gyis bshad pa /
analyzed: slob dpon gyis bshad pa /
translated: The master responds:

original: gal te 'di kun mi stong na //
analyzed: gal te 'di kun mi stong na //
translated: If all these were not empty,

original: 'byung ba med cing 'jig pa med //
analyzed: 'byung ba med cing 'jig pa med //
translated: there would be neither origination nor cessation.

original: ngo bo nyid yod pas nges par gnas pa ngo bo nyid mi 'gyur ba la de dag mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //🔽de'i phyir / gang zhig spang dang 'gag pa las //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid yod pas nges par gnas pa ngo bo nyid mi 'gyur ba la de dag mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro // de'i phyir / gang zhig spang dang 'gag pa las //
translated: Because for that which definitely endures due to the existence of intrinsic reality, which does not change into anything else, these are not tenable.🔽Therefore,🔽you who assert nirvana

original: mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur bar 'dod //
analyzed: mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur bar 'dod //
translated: through the cessation and abandonment of that🔽which is dependently originated,

original: 'di ltar khyod kyis smras pa'i gtan tshigs la rjes su 'gro ba yod par gyur na ni bsgrub par bya ba sgrub nus par yang 'gyur grang na /
analyzed: 'di ltar khyod kyis smras pa'i gtan tshigs la rjes su 'gro ba yod par gyur na ni bsgrub par bya ba sgrub nus par yang 'gyur grang na /
translated: if the reason that you state had a pervasion, then the probandum could be proven.

original: de yang med pas kho bo cag gi phyogs la ngo bo nyid yod par smra ba'i gtan tshigs thun mong ma yin pa nyid dang don 'gal ba nyid kyang yin no //
analyzed: de yang med pas kho bo cag gi phyogs la ngo bo nyid yod par smra ba'i gtan tshigs thun mong ma yin pa nyid dang don 'gal ba nyid kyang yin no //
translated: But since that does not exist, the reason is not established for us, and it is contradictory to the meaning.

original: gtan tshigs kyi don dri bar yang bya ste /
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi don dri bar yang bya ste /
translated: The meaning of the reason should be questioned:

original: ji tha snyad du mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i phyir ram /
analyzed: ji tha snyad du mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i phyir ram /
translated: Is it because nirvana is attained conventionally?

original: 'on te don dam par 'thob pa'i phyir de la gal te tha snyad du ni grub pa la sgrub pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on te don dam par 'thob pa'i phyir de la gal te tha snyad du ni grub pa la sgrub pa yin no //
translated: But if you say that it is attained ultimately, then you are proving what is already established for us, since we also accept that it is attained ultimately.

original: 'on te / don dam par ni kho bo cag / spangs pa med la thob med pa //🔽chad pa med la rtag med pa //
analyzed: 'on te / don dam par ni kho bo cag / spangs pa med la thob med pa // chad pa med la rtag med pa //
translated: But if you say that it is attained conventionally, then we reply:🔽We do not accept🔽cessation as the nonexistence of what existed before,🔽nor as the existence of what did not exist before,🔽nor as the cessation of what existed before,

original: 'gag pa med pa skye med pa //
analyzed: 'gag pa med pa skye med pa //
translated: nor as the noncessation of what did not exist before.

original: de ni mya ngan las 'das par 'dod //
analyzed: de ni mya ngan las 'das par 'dod //
translated: We accept that to be nirvana.

original: de'i phyir nyon mongs pa spang ba dang / ming dang / gzugs 'gags pas mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i phyir ro zhes gang smras pa'i gtan tshigs de'i don ma grub pa nyid do //
analyzed: de'i phyir nyon mongs pa spang ba dang / ming dang / gzugs 'gags pas mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i phyir ro zhes gang smras pa'i gtan tshigs de'i don ma grub pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, the reason you gave, “because nirvana is attained through the abandonment of afflictions and the cessation of name-and-form,” is not established.

original: yang gzhan yang /
analyzed: yang gzhan yang /
translated: Moreover:

original: 'di la mya ngan las 'das pa smra ba dag las kha cig ni /
analyzed: 'di la mya ngan las 'das pa smra ba dag las kha cig ni /
translated: Some proponents of nirvana say that

original: mya ngan las 'das pa rdzas su yod par smra /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa rdzas su yod par smra /
translated: nirvana exists as a thing.

original: gzhan dag ni rdzas su yod pa ma yin par smra ste /
analyzed: gzhan dag ni rdzas su yod pa ma yin par smra ste /
translated: Others say that it does not exist as a thing.

original: de gnyi ga yang ji ltar mi 'thad pa de ltar brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: de gnyi ga yang ji ltar mi 'thad pa de ltar brtag par bya'o //
translated: You should analyze how both of these are untenable.

original: de'i phyir / mya ngan 'das pa dngos po min //
analyzed: de'i phyir / mya ngan 'das pa dngos po min //
translated: Therefore: Nirvana is not a thing.

original: rga shi'i mtshan nyid thal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: rga shi'i mtshan nyid thal bar 'gyur //
translated: The characteristic of aging and death would follow.

original: mya ngan 'das pa dngos po yin par ston pa'i rjes su dpag pa med pa'i phyir dang / dngos po nyid rjes su dpog pas rga shi'i mtshan nyid kyis mya ngan las 'das pa rga shi'i mtshan nyid can du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das pa dngos po yin par ston pa'i rjes su dpag pa med pa'i phyir dang / dngos po nyid rjes su dpog pas rga shi'i mtshan nyid kyis mya ngan las 'das pa rga shi'i mtshan nyid can du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no inference that nirvana is a thing, and because it would follow that nirvana would have the characteristic of aging and death, since it is inferred to be a thing.

original: rga dang 'chi ba med pa yi //
analyzed: rga dang 'chi ba med pa yi //
translated: A thing that is devoid of aging and death

original: dngos po yod pa ma yin @236a * //
analyzed: dngos po yod pa ma yin @236a * //
translated: does not exist.

original: no ; / dngos po ni rga shi med na mi 'byung ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: no ; / dngos po ni rga shi med na mi 'byung ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: The intended meaning is that a thing does not occur without aging and death.

original: de ni mi 'dod de /
analyzed: de ni mi 'dod de /
translated: But that is unacceptable.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa ni rga shi med par 'dod pas de'i phyir smra bar nus te /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa ni rga shi med par 'dod pas de'i phyir smra bar nus te /
translated: Because nirvana is asserted to be devoid of aging and death, therefore it can be said that nirvana is a thing.

original: don dam par mya ngan las 'das pa ni dngos po ma yin te /
analyzed: don dam par mya ngan las 'das pa ni dngos po ma yin te /
translated: But nirvana is not a thing ultimately.

original: rga shi med pa'i phyir dper na mo gsham gyi bu bzhin pas de'i phyir khyod kyi phyogs la yang gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa de nyid yod do //
analyzed: rga shi med pa'i phyir dper na mo gsham gyi bu bzhin pas de'i phyir khyod kyi phyogs la yang gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa de nyid yod do //
translated: Because it is not subject to aging and death, like the son of a barren woman. Therefore, the meaning of your reason is unestablished.

original: yang na sun dbyung ba'i lam gzhan yod de /
analyzed: yang na sun dbyung ba'i lam gzhan yod de /
translated: Or, there is another way to refute this:

original: mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po yin par smra ba dag gi phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po yin par smra ba dag gi phyir bshad pa /
translated: For those who maintain that nirvana is a thing, it is explained:

original: gal te mya ngan 'das dngos na //
analyzed: gal te mya ngan 'das dngos na //
translated: If nirvana were a thing,

original: mya ngan 'das pa 'dus byas 'gyur //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das pa 'dus byas 'gyur //
translated: Nirvana would be a conditioned thing.

original: 'dus byas yin par ni mi 'dod de /
analyzed: 'dus byas yin par ni mi 'dod de /
translated: But it is not maintained that it is a conditioned thing.

original: 'dis ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos ni 'dus byas nyid ma yin par bstan to //🔽dngos po 'dus byas ma yin pa //
analyzed: 'dis ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos ni 'dus byas nyid ma yin par bstan to // dngos po 'dus byas ma yin pa //
translated: This shows that the phenomenon of nirvana is not a conditioned thing.🔽How could any thing that is not a conditioned thing

original: 'ga' yang ji ltar yod ma yin //
analyzed: 'ga' yang ji ltar yod ma yin //
translated: Exist in any way?

original: 'dis ni chos mthun pa'i phyogs kyi dpe bstan to //
analyzed: 'dis ni chos mthun pa'i phyogs kyi dpe bstan to //
translated: This shows the example of a similar property.

original: de'i phyir rjes su dpag pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa ni dngos po ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir rjes su dpag pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa ni dngos po ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, the inference is: Nirvana is not a thing,

original: 'dus byas ma yin pa'i phyir dper na nam mkha'i me tog bzhin no //
analyzed: 'dus byas ma yin pa'i phyir dper na nam mkha'i me tog bzhin no //
translated: because it is not a conditioned thing, like a sky flower.

original: yang na sbyor ba'i lam gzhan yang yod de /
analyzed: yang na sbyor ba'i lam gzhan yang yod de /
translated: Or else, there is another path of action.

original: gal te mya ngan las 'das dngos na //
analyzed: gal te mya ngan las 'das dngos na //
translated: If nirvana is a thing,

original: ji ltar myang 'das de brten min //
analyzed: ji ltar myang 'das de brten min //
translated: how can nirvana be nondependent?

original: dngos po ni brten nas gdags par bya ba nyid med na mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: dngos po ni brten nas gdags par bya ba nyid med na mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: The idea is that a thing does not occur without being dependent for its designation.

original: 'dis ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos ni brten nas gdags par bya ba nyid ma yin par bstan to //
analyzed: 'dis ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos ni brten nas gdags par bya ba nyid ma yin par bstan to //
translated: This shows that the phenomenon of nirvana is not dependent for its designation.

original: de nyid kyi phyir bshad pa /🔽dngos po brten par ma yin pa //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir bshad pa / dngos po brten par ma yin pa //
translated: Therefore it is said:🔽There is no existent thing

original: 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: that is nondependent.

original: gang ma brten par yod pa'i dngos po ni 'ga' yang med do //
analyzed: gang ma brten par yod pa'i dngos po ni 'ga' yang med do //
translated: There is no existent thing at all that is nondependent.

original: 'dis ni chos mthun pa'i phyogs kyi dpe bstan to //
analyzed: 'dis ni chos mthun pa'i phyogs kyi dpe bstan to //
translated: This shows the example of the similar class.

original: de'i phyir rjes su dpag pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa ni dngos po ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir rjes su dpag pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa ni dngos po ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, the inference is: Nirvana is not a thing,

original: brten nas gdags par bya ba nyid ma yi pa'i phyir dper na ri bong gi rva bzhin no //
analyzed: brten nas gdags par bya ba nyid ma yi pa'i phyir dper na ri bong gi rva bzhin no //
translated: because it is not dependent for its designation, like the horn of an ass.

original: gos dmar sde gang dag mya ngan las 'das pa mar me shi ba bzhin no zhes smra ba dang / mdo sde pa dag skye ba med pa tsam la mya ngan las 'das par tha snyad 'dogs pa de dag gi phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: gos dmar sde gang dag mya ngan las 'das pa mar me shi ba bzhin no zhes smra ba dang / mdo sde pa dag skye ba med pa tsam la mya ngan las 'das par tha snyad 'dogs pa de dag gi phyir bshad pa /
translated: The red-robed Saṃmatīyas say that nirvana is like the extinction of a lamp, and the Sautrāntikas say that the mere absence of arising is designated as nirvana.

original: gal te mya ngan 'das dngos min //
analyzed: gal te mya ngan 'das dngos min //
translated: If nirvana is not a thing,

original: dngos med ji ltar rung bar 'gyur //🔽gal te mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po med pa yin na dngos po med pa rdzas @236b su med pa'i rnam grangs bye brag tu smra ba la sogs pas brtags pa /
analyzed: dngos med ji ltar rung bar 'gyur // gal te mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po med pa yin na dngos po med pa rdzas @236b su med pa'i rnam grangs bye brag tu smra ba la sogs pas brtags pa /
translated: how could it be a nonthing?

original: don dam pa'i dge ba dang nyon mongs pa nye bar zhi ba'i mtshan nyid dag ji ltar rung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: don dam pa'i dge ba dang nyon mongs pa nye bar zhi ba'i mtshan nyid dag ji ltar rung bar 'gyur te /
translated: If nirvana is a nonthing, how could it be the ultimate virtue and the characteristic of the pacification of afflictions, as the Vaibhāṣikas and so on assert?

original: dngos po med pa la nam mkha'i me tog bzhin du dge ba nyid la sogs pa dag mi 'thad pa'i phyir dang / mya ngan las 'das pa rdzas su med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin par ston pa'i rjes su dpag pa med pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po med pa ma yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa la nam mkha'i me tog bzhin du dge ba nyid la sogs pa dag mi 'thad pa'i phyir dang / mya ngan las 'das pa rdzas su med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin par ston pa'i rjes su dpag pa med pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po med pa ma yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: Because virtue and so on are untenable with respect to a nonthing, like a sky flower, and because there is no inference that demonstrates nirvana to be a nonentity, nirvana is not a nonthing.

original: yang gzhan yang /
analyzed: yang gzhan yang /
translated: Moreover,

original: ji skad bstan pa'i sgrub pas /
analyzed: ji skad bstan pa'i sgrub pas /
translated: through the proof that has been taught,

original: gang la mya ngan 'das dngos yin //
analyzed: gang la mya ngan 'das dngos yin //
translated: nirvana is a thing.

original: de la dngos med yod ma yin //🔽mar me'i dpes mar me ni dngos po nyid yin par 'jig rten la grags te /
analyzed: de la dngos med yod ma yin // mar me'i dpes mar me ni dngos po nyid yin par 'jig rten la grags te /
translated: A nonthing does not exist for it.

original: phyis med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyis med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The example of the butterlamp is renowned in the world as a thing because it is not nonexistent later.

original: yang gzhan yang /
analyzed: yang gzhan yang /
translated: Moreover,

original: gal te mya ngan 'das dngos min //
analyzed: gal te mya ngan 'das dngos min //
translated: if nirvana were a nonthing,🔽it would be a nonthing that is imputed in dependence on another.

original: mar me dngos po med pa brten nas gdags pa ni brten nas gdags par bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: mar me dngos po med pa brten nas gdags pa ni brten nas gdags par bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: The meaning is that it would be a nonthing that is imputed in dependence on another because it is imputed in dependence on another, like the nonexistence of a butterlamp.

original: de nyid kyi phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir bshad pa /
translated: Thus it is said:

original: gang zhig brten pa ma yin pa'i //
analyzed: gang zhig brten pa ma yin pa'i //
translated: That which is not dependent

original: dngos med yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos med yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Does not exist as a non-thing.

original: gang ma brten par yod pa'i dngos po med pa ni 'ga' yang med do //
analyzed: gang ma brten par yod pa'i dngos po med pa ni 'ga' yang med do //
translated: There is no existent thing that does not depend.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar ji skad bstan pa'i tshul gyis don dam par mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po dang dngos po med pa ma yin pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar ji skad bstan pa'i tshul gyis don dam par mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po dang dngos po med pa ma yin pa de'i phyir /
translated: Because nirvana is neither a thing nor a non-thing in the ultimate sense, as has been explained,

original: 'ong ba dang ni 'gro ba'i dngos //🔽brten te ma rgyur byas gang yin pa //
analyzed: 'ong ba dang ni 'gro ba'i dngos // brten te ma rgyur byas gang yin pa //
translated: The reality of coming and going🔽Is dependent and fabricated.

original: de ni brten min rgyur byas min //
analyzed: de ni brten min rgyur byas min //
translated: That which is not dependent and not fabricated

original: mya ngan 'das pa yin par bstan //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das pa yin par bstan //
translated: Is taught to be nirvana.

original: 'ong ba dang 'gro ba'i dngos po brten nas 'byung ba dang / rgyur byas nas gdags pa gang yin pa de dag brten nas 'byung ba med pa dang / rgyur byas nas gdags pa med pa ni tha snyad du mya ngan las 'das pa yin par bstan pas don dam par mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po dang /
analyzed: 'ong ba dang 'gro ba'i dngos po brten nas 'byung ba dang / rgyur byas nas gdags pa gang yin pa de dag brten nas 'byung ba med pa dang / rgyur byas nas gdags pa med pa ni tha snyad du mya ngan las 'das pa yin par bstan pas don dam par mya ngan las 'das pa dngos po dang /
translated: The reality of coming and going is dependent origination and is imputed through fabrication. That which is not dependent origination and is not imputed through fabrication is taught to be nirvana conventionally. In the ultimate sense, nirvana is neither a thing nor a non-thing.

original: dngos po ma yin pa nyid du bkag kyang khas blangs pa la gnod pa'i skabs med do //
analyzed: dngos po ma yin pa nyid du bkag kyang khas blangs pa la gnod pa'i skabs med do //
translated: Even though you refute the fact that it is a thing, there is no occasion for you to accept that it is not a thing.

original: yang gzhan yang /
analyzed: yang gzhan yang /
translated: Moreover,

original: 'byung ba dang ni 'jig pa dag / spong bar ston pas bka' stsal to //
analyzed: 'byung ba dang ni 'jig pa dag / spong bar ston pas bka' stsal to //
translated: The Teacher has declared that the abandonment of origination and destruction

original: mdo sde las ji skad du /
analyzed: mdo sde las ji skad du /
translated: In the sutra it says:

original: gang dag 'byung ba'am 'jig pas srid pa las nges par 'byung ba yongs su tshol bar byed pa de dag gi de ni yongs su mi shes pa yin no zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: gang dag 'byung ba'am 'jig pas srid pa las nges par 'byung ba yongs su tshol bar byed pa de dag gi de ni yongs su mi shes pa yin no zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o //
translated: Those who seek liberation from cyclic existence through origination and destruction do not understand it.

original: de phyir mya ngan 'das pa ni //
analyzed: de phyir mya ngan 'das pa ni //
translated: Therefore, nirvana

original: @237a * // dngos min dngos med min par rigs //
analyzed: @237a * // dngos min dngos med min par rigs //
translated: Should be understood as neither a thing nor a nonthing.

original: gal te 'byung ba ni spang bar bya ba nyid kyis sun dbyung bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gal te 'byung ba ni spang bar bya ba nyid kyis sun dbyung bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir /
translated: If you say that origination is to be refuted because it is to be abandoned,

original: dngos po nyid 'gag par mi rigs so zhe na /
analyzed: dngos po nyid 'gag par mi rigs so zhe na /
translated: then it is not tenable that a thing ceases.

original: 'byung ba yang 'khor ba'i dngos po'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir skyon med do //🔽gzhan dag gis smras pa /
analyzed: 'byung ba yang 'khor ba'i dngos po'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir skyon med do // gzhan dag gis smras pa /
translated: We reply, there is no error because origination is the nature of the thing of cyclic existence.

original: thar pa'i don ni dngos po yang yin la //
analyzed: thar pa'i don ni dngos po yang yin la //
translated: Others say: The meaning of liberation is a thing.

original: dngos po med pa yang yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dngos po med pa yang yin pa'i phyir /
translated: because it is also a non-entity.

original: gnyi ga'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir skyon med do //
analyzed: gnyi ga'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir skyon med do //
translated: There is no fault because it is the identity of both.

original: gzhan dag gis smras pa /
analyzed: gzhan dag gis smras pa /
translated: Others say:

original: de'i phyir 'di bshad de /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di bshad de /
translated: Therefore, this is explained:

original: gal te mya ngan 'das pa ni //
analyzed: gal te mya ngan 'das pa ni //
translated: If nirvana were

original: dngos dang dngos med gnyis yin la //
analyzed: dngos dang dngos med gnyis yin la //
translated: both an entity and a non-entity,🔽it would be illogical for

original: dngos dang dngos po med pa dag / thar par 'gyur bar de mi rigs //
analyzed: dngos dang dngos po med pa dag / thar par 'gyur bar de mi rigs //
translated: an entity and a non-entity to be liberation.

original: dgag pa mi mthun pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: dgag pa mi mthun pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because the negations are incompatible.

original: gal te dngos po yin na ji ltar dngos po med pa yin /
analyzed: gal te dngos po yin na ji ltar dngos po med pa yin /
translated: If it is an entity, how could it be a non-entity?

original: ci ste dngos po med pa yin na ni dngos po zhes bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: ci ste dngos po med pa yin na ni dngos po zhes bya ba ma yin no //
translated: But if it is a non-entity, it is not called an entity.

original: ci ste yang ltos pa'i dbang gis dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i mtshan nyid yin te /
analyzed: ci ste yang ltos pa'i dbang gis dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i mtshan nyid yin te /

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /

analyzed: lta ba de dag yod pa ma yin pas de brtag pa'i phyir 'di bshad de /

original: mtha' la sogs pa ni 'jig rten mtha' yod pa dang / mtha' med pa dang / mtha' yod kyang yod la mtha' med kyang med pa dang / mtha' yod pa yang ma yin mtha' med pa yang ma yin par lta ba'o //
